code: export const authEndpoint="https://accounts.spotify.com/authorize";const redirectUri="http://localhost:3000/";const clientId="de45e40083c44d2181796cf48f0f11ac";const scopes=["user-read-currently-playing","user-read-recently-played","user-read-playback-state","user-top-read","user-modify-playback-state"];export const getTokenFromUrl=()=>{return window.location.hash.substring(1).split("&").reduce((initial,item)=>{let parts=item.split("=");initial[parts[0]]=decodeURIComponent(parts[1]);return initial;},{});};export const loginUrl="".concat(authEndpoint,"?client_id=").concat(clientId,"&redirect_uri=").concat(redirectUri,"&scope=").concat(scopes.join("%20"),"&response_type=token&show_dialog=true");
